00006 using namespace lcio ;
00007 using namespace marlin ;

00009 AhcSROmappingProcessor aAhcSROmappingProcessor;
00010 
00011 /********************************************************************/
00012 /*                                                                  */
00013 /*                                                                  */
00014 /*                                                                  */
00015 /********************************************************************/
00016 AhcSROmappingProcessor::AhcSROmappingProcessor() : Processor("AhcSROmappingProcessor")
00017 {
00018   _description = "fixes the mapping of the AhcSlowReaoutModBlocks";
00019 
00020   registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00021                            "inCollectionName" , 
00022                            "Name of the MCParticle collection"  ,
00023                            _inColName ,
00024                            std::string("AhcSroModData") ) ;
00025 
00026   registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00027                            "mappingCollectionName" , 
00028                            "Name of the MCParticle collection"  ,
00029                            _mappingColName ,
00030                            std::string("AhcSroModMapping") ) ;
00031   
00032   registerOutputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00033                            "outCollectionName" , 
00034                            "Name of the MCParticle collection"  ,
00035                            _outColName ,
00036                            std::string("AhcSroModData_fixed") ) ;
00037 }

00039 /********************************************************************/
00040 /*                                                                  */
00041 /*                                                                  */
00042 /*                                                                  */
00043 /********************************************************************/
00044 void AhcSROmappingProcessor::init() 
00045 { 
00046   /* usually a good idea to*/
00047   printParameters() ;
00048 
00049   _lastDataCol = 0;
00050 
00051   _mappingAvailable = false;
00052 
00053   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _mappingColName)) 
00054     streamlog_out(ERROR) << "The collection " << _mappingColName 
00055                  << " is not registered in the conditions processor! No data can be processed." 
00056                  << std::endl;
00057 
00058   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _inColName)) 
00059     streamlog_out(ERROR) << "The collection " << _inColName 
00060                  <<" is not registered in the conditions processor! No data can be processed." 
00061                  << std::endl;
00062 
00063   _conditionsHandler = new CALICE::RunTimeConditionsHandler(_outColName);
00064   lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->registerHandler(_outColName,_conditionsHandler);
00065   
00066   _mappingCol = NULL;
00067   _inCol      = NULL;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 /********************************************************************/
00072 /*                                                                  */
00073 /*                                                                  */
00074 /*                                                                  */
00075 /********************************************************************/
00076 void AhcSROmappingProcessor::conditionsChanged( LCCollection * col ) 
00077 {
00078   std::string colName = col->getParameters().getStringVal("CollectionName") ;
00079   
00080   if (colName == _mappingColName)
00081     {
00082       _mappingCol = col;
00083       _mappingChanged = true;
00084     }
00085   else if (colName == _inColName)
00086     {
00087       _inCol = col;
00088       _inputChanged = true;
00089     }
00090 
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 /********************************************************************/
00095 /*                                                                  */
00096 /*                                                                  */
00097 /*                                                                  */
00098 /********************************************************************/
00099 void AhcSROmappingProcessor::processEvent( LCEvent * evt ) 
00100 { 
00101   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "   processing event: " << evt->getEventNumber() 
00102                << "   in run:  " << evt->getRunNumber() 
00103                << std::endl ;
00104 
00105 
00106   if (_mappingChanged == true)
00107     {
00108       _mapper.updateMapping(_mappingCol);
00109 
00110       _mappingAvailable = true;
00111 
00112       _mappingChanged = false;
00113     }
00114 
00115 
00116   if (_inputChanged == true)
00117     {
00118       if (_mappingAvailable)
00119         _conditionsHandler->update(_mapper.mapCollection(_inCol));
00120 
00121       _inputChanged = false;
00122     }
00123 
00124 }
